title: 初中英语沪教版九年级上册

children.title: Unit 1 Wise men in history
Reading "Archimedes and the golden crown"
Listening & Speaking "The ancient Olympics; Asking for agreement or confirmation; Helen at the Olympics"
Grammar "Question tags; Sentence types"
Writing "Improve your work"
More practice & Culture corner "Cao Chong weighs an elephant; Laozi"
Unit 2 Great minds
Reading “Two geniuses”
Listening & Speaking “Three great minds; Leaving and taking phone messages; A famous person”
Grammar "Infinitives after nouns; Infinitives as subjects; Infinitives after the verb to be"
Writing "Floating listeners"
More practice & Culture corner "Einstein and the little girl; Isaac Newton"
Unit 3 Family life
Reading "Family life in cities"
Listening & Speaking "Family members; Offering, accepting and refusing help"
Grammar "Linking verb be; Other linking verbs; Linking verbs followed by nouns or noun phrases"
Writing "My family life"
More practice & Culture corner "How to communicate with your parents; Family trees"
Unit 4 Problems and advice
Reading "Aunt Linda's advice page"
Listening & Speaking "Advice from Aunt Alice; Asking for and giving advice; What advice would you give about students' problems"
Grammar "Sentence elements: subjects, verbs, objects, complements and adverbials"
Writing "An email to Aunt Linda"
More practice & Culture corner "Replies from Aunt Linda; Agony aunts"
Unit 5 Action!
Reading "Surprises at the studio"
Listening & Speaking "Visiting the TV station; Expressing praise and encouragement; Students'TV viewing habits"
Grammar "Adverbial clauses of concession with although and though"
Writing "A script for hosting a show"
More practice & Culture corner "We love the Film Park!  International film festivals"
Unit 6 Healthy diet
Reading "What's a  balanced diet?"
Listening & Speaking "Ordering food; Expressing preferences; A weekly lunch menu"
Grammar "Object clauses"
Writing "A restaurant review"
More Practice & Culture corner "Two poems about farming; The tale of the tomato"
Unit 7 The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
Reading "Tom Sawyer paints the fence"
Listening & Speaking "A jumping frog; Expressing congratulations and sympathy; My favourite story"
Grammar "Relative clauses with who, that and which"
Writing "A report on a story"
More practice & Culture corner "Tom and Becky in the cave; Adventures of Huckleberry Finn"
Unit 8 Surprise endings
Reading "The gifts"
Listening&SpeakingListening & Speaking "How much do you know about O.Henry? Disagreeing in a polite way; What kinds of gifts do you usually give on special days?
Grammar "Using prepositions after adjectives / nouns/ verbs"
Writing "The most valuable gift"
More practice & Culture corner "The last leaf; White elephants"
